## expStep variable

Exponential ramp with variable shape, e.g.

- S-curve: k=8, n=4 - Step near 1.0: k=8, n=20 - Pulse: k=0.005, n=-10 - Ease-in: k=0.5, n=0.25

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
expStep: (k: number, n: number, x: number) => number
```
